name: Taxi Rampage
description:
Your a Taxi driver and you need to get everyone home but its too easy to drive everyone home you want to do your Job and play some sports at the same time, Car football anyone.

Controls

Up - Accelerate

Down - Brake/Reverse

Left - Turn Left

Right - Turn Right

and most important Space to Honk

Play easy mode and get all the fares to the goals by dribbling them using your Taxi within the allocated time, or if you want a challenge play on hard mode and any object you bump of crash into will be paid for straight out of your pocket.

Enjoy the game, I should be posting a devlog of the making of Taxi Rampage soon and why not check out my other games and devlogs on my YouTube channel.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3txq3Jo6ev_GydDxKMvMeg

Cheers
